summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.0°C) and outside temperature (down 6.2°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 12457 lux) and cloud levels (up 694 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14170 lux) and cloud levels (up 1642 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 693.7m lower than yesterday, 630.7m lower than the past week, 1641.8m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 1059m and a peak of 3380m, averaging 1030.6m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, air moisture should feel ok. A few light raindrops may fall, occasional overcast conditions, and overcast conditions will limit sunlight. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
